A few days passed after Inori and I became\nofficial, and we were teased by Akane and\nblessed by Maika.%K%P
Now that we were girlfriend and boyfriend, Inori\nstopped avoiding me. As if to compensate, she\nwas always by my side.%K%P
I was also so happy next to her that I even\ncaught myself following her.%K%P
When Akane made fun of us and called us love\nbirds, I accepted it as a compliment.%K%P
All these happy days brought me so much joy.%K%P
'Sho.'%K%P
I suddenly heard a sweet, charming voice in my\nsleep.%K%P
'It's already morning. Please wake up.'%K%P
'I'm still sleepy...'%K%P
'You're usually so charismatic, please don't act\nlike a child.'%K%P
She shook my body diligently to wake me up, but\nit actually made me sleepier.%K%P
'Sho, please wake up.'%K%P
'What? Ah!'%K%P
I pulled her under the covers.%K%P
I felt something soft in my arms, accompanied by\na sweet aroma. I slowly began to open my eyes.%K%P
'Good morning, Sho.'%K%P
After I opened my eyes, the face of my beloved\njumped into my sight.%K%P
'Good morning, Inori.'%K%P
She giggled at me when I greeted her, still half\nasleep.%K%P
'You're Mr. Sleepyhead today. You woke up 30\nminutes later than usual.'%K%P
'30 minutes... What happened to breakfast?'%K%P
'Maika had class duty and already left for\nschool, and Akane left because she apparently\nhad somewhere to be.'%K%P
'So we're the only ones who haven't had\nbreakfast yet.'%K%P
'I see...'%K%P
My brain finally caught up.%K%P
'Yes, so can you please let go of me now?'%K%P
'Let me hold you a little longer.'%K%P
'Heheh, all right.'%K%P
Despite that, Inori smiled and willingly put her\narms around me.%K%P
'Inori... Muah.'%K%P
'Sho... M-Muah.'%K%P
We managed to exchange our morning kiss.%K%P
As the warmth from her lips filled my heart, my\nsleepiness vanished.%K%P
'Ah... Th-That's enough. The day has just\nstarted.'%K%P
'You were all into it too.'%K%P
'W-Well... I wasn't going to reject a kiss from\nyou.'%K%P
Inori blushed with her hands on her face.%K%P
Man, I just can't get enough of her cuteness.%K%P
As much as I wanted to enjoy her more, it was\nabout time I got up.%K%P
'Let's eat.'%K%P
After we set the table, Inori and I had our late\nbreakfast.%K%P
'Oh? Did Maika change up the seasoning?'%K%P
I tilted my head as I sipped on the miso soup.%K%P
'Oh, actually...Maika taught me how to prepare\nthe soup for today.'%K%P
'Is it not to your liking?'%K%P
So it was Inori who made the soup.%K%P
'It's good, but... It could use a little more\nflavor.'%K%P
'So you prefer stronger seasoning?'%K%P
'That's just my preference. It's still pretty\ngood.'%K%P
'No, now I know how to prepare it for you next\ntime!'%K%P
I didn't want to be harsh and hinder Inori's\nburning determination, so I decided to keep my\nmouth shut.%K%P
'Would you like some soy sauce?'%K%P
'Please.'%K%P
'I'll serve the rice too. A large serving,\nright?'%K%P
'That's perfect.'%K%P
Inori anticipated my wants and acted before I\ncould say too much.%K%P
'This is kinda nice, isn't it?'%K%P
'What is?'%K%P
I was deep in thought when I accepted the rice\nfrom Inori.%K%P
'It feels like we're husband and wife. We're in\nsync.'%K%P
'H-Husband and wife? Goodness, Sho!'%K%P
I gobbled down the rice as I smiled at the\nembarrassed Inori, who was still holding the\nrice paddle.%K%P
'Sho? It's not good for your digestion when you\neat fast like that.'%K%P
'I can't help it when the food tastes so good.'%K%P
'S-Stop it. Flattery won't work on me.'%K%P
'Here's some tea. The rice won't go anywhere, so\nplease slow your pace.'%K%P
'Thank you.'%K%P
As I drank the tea served by Inori, I savored\nthe moment.%K%P
'Inori, what are you doing today?'%K%P
'Maika asked me to go get groceries for dinner.\nI'll be headed to the shopping street after I\nfinish cleaning.'%K%P
'I'll go with you.'%K%P
'Are you sure?'%K%P
'It's a good opportunity to go out with you.\nI'll help you carry the groceries.'%K%P
'Heheh. I'll be counting on you. Oh, why don't\nwe go on a walk while we're out and about too?'%K%P
'A walk? Good idea. It'd be a waste if all we do\nis shop for groceries.'%K%P
'Then, it's set! I'm looking forward to it.'%K%P
Seeing Inori's contagious smile made me excited\nto go out too.%K%P
